text:
Hi Community,
Could some provide more insight here?
I added the HubSpot tracking code and I am able to pull in form submission from many forms on a website. The problem is some forms are multi-step forms so the HS tracking code creates a contact without collecting all the data. What is the best way to fix this?
I assume I would have to used the forms api endpoint but not sure how I can use this and at the same time prevent HubSpot from creating contacts via the tracking code for non HS forms......
Thanks <@U8THBCFC4> and <@UBT0AHWLD>. I really appreciate that.

Hi,
We are working on a project where we would like to connect our Microsoft services with HubSpot via an ODBC connector or alike. We are looking for technical assistance with this to ensure we have live data in places like Excel, Sharepoint and PowerBI.
Hi <@UM433J43U> yes we can help you in this and thanks <@UBT0AHWLD> for mentioning me.
Can you please send me a message in personal with more details
